subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball (College)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Duke sophomore Rodney Hood is entering the N.B.A. draft. Hood, who sat out last season after transferring from Mississippi State, averaged 16.1 points and 3.9 rebounds.
snippet: The Duke sophomore Rodney Hood is entering the N.B.A. draft. Hood, who sat out last season after transferring from Mississippi State, averaged 16.1 points and 3.9 rebounds.
